h2_title: Centipede Guai Boss Fight and Guide
content: Dozens of smaller centipedes will roll over the nearby ledge and into the arena to chase you on multiple fronts, and explode on impact.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Centipede_Guai.md', within the main section titled 'Centipede Guai', specifically from the subsection 'Centipede Guai Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Dozens of smaller centipedes will roll over the nearby ledge and into the arena to chase you on multiple fronts, and explode on impact.
